entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 7:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
